ai-sql.title: AI SQL Generator
ai-sql.welcome: Welcome to the SQL Generator! I can help you convert your code to SQL. You can start pasting code or uploading a file.

app-icon.description: Generate iOS and Android app icons in various sizes
app-icon.file-name-description: Change file name for all generated Android images

instructions.for-android-2: 2. Navigate to your Android project's app/src/main/res directory
instructions.for-android-3: 3. Copy all the mipmap-* folders from the generated package
instructions.for-android-4: 4. Paste them into your res directory, replacing existing ones if needed
instructions.for-android-5: 5. Replace the existing icons in your project with the new ones
instructions.how-to-use: How to use the generated icons:
instructions.how-to-use-ios-2: 2. Drag the generated AppIcon.appiconset folder into your project
instructions.how-to-use-ios-3: 3. In your project navigator, locate the Assets.xcassets folder
instructions.how-to-use-ios-4: 4. Drag the generated AppIcon.appiconset folder into it
instructions.how-to-use-ios-5: 5. Xcode will automatically recognize and apply the app icons
instructions.store-submissions-android: Play Store: Use playstore.png (512x512) from the root folder
instructions.store-submissions-both: Both stores also receive an appstore.png in the root for convenience

app-icon.title: App Icon Generator
app-icon.upload-description: Upload a 1024x1024px PNG image to generate icons for all platforms.

basic.description: Learn how to use regular expressions effectively with our tester.

flags.case: i (Case Insensitive) - Match regardless of case
flags.dotAll: s (Dot All) - Dot matches newlines too
flags.global: g (Global) - Find all matches rather than stopping at first match
flags.multiline: m (Multiline) - ^ and $ match start/end of each line
flags.title: Regex Flags

patterns.phone: Phone Numbers - Match various phone number formats
patterns.simple: Simple Text - Match exact text or words
patterns.title: Common Patterns
patterns.url: URLs - Match web addresses and domains

basic.title: Basic Usage

list.flags: Support for all JavaScript regex flags
list.match_highlighting: Visual match highlighting in test string
list.title: Available Features

list.escape_chars: Remember to escape special characters (., *, +, etc.)
list.groups: Use capturing groups to extract specific parts of matches
list.start_simple: Start with simple patterns and build up complexity
list.test_cases: Test your regex against multiple test cases
list.title: Usage Tips
list.use_flags: Use appropriate flags for your use case

tips.note: Note: Regular expressions are powerful but can be complex. Test thoroughly before using in production.
tips.title: Tips & Best Practices
